about_the_game:
Don’t let your noblewomen have all the fun, give your men some voices too with NPC Male Nobles Vol.1! TK. Projects’ latest SE pack brings us another set of Japanese voice clips to help liven up your games. Fill your noble districts and castles with the sounds of cheerful young boys, grouchy eldery patriarchs, and suave butlers with this pack of 120 SEs!

Features:

* 120 different phrases and sayings
* 12 characters, 10 SE per character
* ogg and m4a file formats included

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games

Minimum:
  • OS *:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Memory:512 MB RAM

short_description: You’ve added voices to your game’s rural towns and villages to help them feel lived in, but what about the noble’s mansions and royal castle? Well, it’s time to give those areas some voices of their own with the NPC Male Nobles Vol.1 pack!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Italian, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese
